<<<<<<< HEAD
The hospitall of incurable fooles: erected in English, as neer the first Italian modell and platforme, as the vnskilfull hand of an ignorant architect could deuise Hospidale de' pazzi incurabili. English Garzoni, Tomaso, 1549?-1589. Nash, Thomas, 1567-1601. Blount, Edward, fl. 1588-1632.
[14], 158, [2] p.
Printed by Edm. Bollifant, for Edward Blount, [London] : 1600.
Translation of: Garzoni, Tomaso. L'hospidale de' pazzi incurabili. Possibly translated by Edward Blount; translation also sometimes ascribed to Thomas Nash. The last leaf is blank. Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
=======

[14], 158, [2] p.
Printed by Edm. Bollifant, for Edward Blount, [London] : 1600.
Translation of: Garzoni, Tomaso. L'hospidale de' pazzi incurabili. Possibly translated by Edward Blount; translation also sometimes ascribed to Thomas Nash. The last leaf is blank. Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
Edward Blount
